articles.title: Sevilla FC vs. Chelsea - Football Match Report - December 2, 2020 - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Get a report of the Sevilla FC vs. Chelsea 2020-21 UEFA Champions League, Group Stage football match.
articles.content:
Olivier Giroud scored four goals as Chelsea beat Sevilla 4-0 to secure top spot in Champions League Group E on Wednesday night.
